medical_history.chief_complaint: Mass on the left thoracic wall
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had a 3-month history of productive cough, yellowish sputum, and low fever prior to the detection of a hard mass on her left thoracic wall, which demonstrated slow progressive growth.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV infection since 1994, treated with zidovudine, lamivudine, and didanosine since 1996 with good immunologic and virologic responses.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's husband, who was HIV-seropositive, died during an MDR-TB outbreak in 1994.
